thread.title: Prince Harry & Meghan Markle Walk Down The Aisle In Jamaica
thread.title_full: Prince Harry & Meghan Markle Walk Down The Aisle In Jamaica

author: Radar Staff
title: Prince Harry & Meghan Markle Walk Down The Aisle In Jamaica
text: Fame/Flynet Fame/Flynet Prince Harry and Meghan Markle can't keep it a secret any longer — these two took their romance to the next level on Friday. Click through to see their secret wedding photos! Fame/Flynet Fame/Flynet Fame/Flynet Fame/Flynet Harry sported a blue suit with a yellow corsage while his bride-to-be wore a long black-and-green flowery ensemble. Fame/Flynet Fame/Flynet They were later even caught walking down the aisle at one point as Harry ushered her to their seats before the ceremony began. Fame/Flynet Fame/Flynet Eyewitnesses said the two were kissing and cuddling as they chatted and drank wine in the warm climate. Fame/Flynet Fame/Flynet "This is the first time that she and Harry have socialized so openly as a couple and [it's] a significant step up in their relationship," a source told the Daily Mail about their trip. MEGA MEGA As Radar reported, Harry took the unusual step of publicly confirming his relationship with the Suits actress last year — but Prince Charles was furious about his son's move . MEGA MEGA Despite his dad's disapproval, their romance continues to move forward — and fast! Last month, Markle was spotted shopping for flowers in London where she was caught wearing an "H" ring on her finger ! As Radar readers know, Harry is preparing to propose to Markle, and recently had her meet the rest of his family in preparation.   X
